ocris: Optical character recognition or optical character reader is the electronic or mechanical conversion of images of typed, handwritten or printed text into machine-encoded text, whether from a scanned document, a photo of a document, a scene-photo or from subtitle text superimposed on an image.
getfeatuers:
• Recognize image from camera
• Recognize image from gallery
• Storing text and image recognized
• Supporting 6 languages for the app
• Supporting 5 languages for the text recognizing
